body: Breaking things adds to your power.
name: Destroyer's Blessing
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/New Racial Rules/Half-Orc Feats/Destroyers Blessing

sections.body: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When you are raging and you succeed at a sunder combat maneuver, you regain 1 round of rage. If the sunder attempt causes the object to gain the broken condition, you heal 1 hit point. You can only gain these benefits once per round.
sections.name: Benefit
